radiographic_examinations.findings: Trace dependent atelectasis in the lung bases, normal heart size, liver without focal lesion, unremarkable gallbladder, spleen, pancreas, adrenal glands, and bilateral kidneys. Small and large bowel loops normal in caliber. The appendix is hyperemic, dilated (up to 9 mm), demonstrates adjacent stranding. No periappendiceal collection or free air. Great vessels patent. No mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy. Bladder, distal ureters, rectum, and prostate unremarkable. No inguinal or pelvic lymphadenopathy. No free fluid in the pelvis. Bone island in left ilium. Irregular appearance of S1 with superior endplate sclerosis and fragmentation suggestive of prior infection.
